-- 【dgRv4.2.7 - SQL 異動】 修正v4.2.6.1的資料

-- Kevin Cheng, 修正 sortby, 20240531
-- Auto-generated SQL script #202405311044
UPDATE TSMP_DP_ITEMS
	SET SORT_BY=320
	WHERE ITEM_NO='SCHED_CATE1' AND SUBITEM_NO='API_SCHEDULED';

UPDATE TSMP_DP_ITEMS
    SET SORT_BY=517
    WHERE ITEM_NO='SCHED_MSG' AND SUBITEM_NO='API 預定功能喚醒';

UPDATE TSMP_DP_ITEMS
    SET SORT_BY=517
    WHERE ITEM_NO='SCHED_MSG' AND SUBITEM_NO='API_SCH_WAKE-UP';

    SET SORT_BY=518
    WHERE ITEM_NO='SCHED_MSG' AND SUBITEM_NO='撈取預定啟用 API';

    WHERE ITEM_NO='SCHED_MSG' AND SUBITEM_NO='FISHING_SCH_EN_API';

    WHERE ITEM_NO='SCHED_MSG' AND SUBITEM_NO='變更為啟用狀態';

    WHERE ITEM_NO='SCHED_MSG' AND SUBITEM_NO='CHANGE_EN_STATE';

    WHERE ITEM_NO='SCHED_MSG' AND SUBITEM_NO='CHANGE_DIS_STATE';

    WHERE ITEM_NO='SCHED_MSG' AND SUBITEM_NO='變更為下架狀態';

UPDATE TSMP_DP_ITEMS
    SET SORT_BY=525
    WHERE ITEM_NO='SCHED_MSG' AND SUBITEM_NO='CHANGE_REMOVAL_STATE';
